title: Add test data for master (WGS) pipeline
body: Instead of just example filenames, we should have small fastq files to allow the pipeline to be tested.

title: Handle single-end reads
body: Currently we have a hard-coded assumption of paired-end reads

title: Add better documentation for ENSEMBL VEP
body: The annotation step uses the ENSEMBL Variant Effect Predictor but doesn't adequately explain how to get it.

title: Give an intelligible warning if we cannot find any valid input data
Add test data for exome pipeline
body: This is really a separate task from WGS test data as data input should be different

title: example doesn't run out of the box
body:
# 
# example doesn't run out of the box
# 
# Running in examples directory gives missing utils module error

rubra example_pipeline.py --config example_config.py --style run

[achalk@merri examples]$ ../rubra/rubra.py example_pipeline.py --config example_config.py --style run
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "../rubra/rubra.py", line 86, in <module>
    main()
  File "../rubra/rubra.py", line 35, in main
    **import**(drop_py_suffix(args.pipeline))
  File "example_pipeline.py", line 15, in <module>
    from rubra.utils import (runStageCheck)
ImportError: No module named utils
# copying the example_pipeline.p, example_config.py and examples/test to rubra directory fixes this
# But there is an error in the pipeline.

[achalk@merri rubra]$ rubra/rubra.py example_pipeline.py --config example_config.py --style run
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "rubra/rubra.py", line 86, in <module>
    main()
  File "rubra/rubra.py", line 66, in main
    gnu_make_maximal_rebuild_mode=rebuildMode)
  File "build/bdist.linux-x86_64/egg/ruffus/task.py", line 2680, in pipeline_run
ruffus.ruffus_exceptions.RethrownJobError:

title: Do bwa indexing inside the pipeline
body: The disadvantage of this is that it's slightly trickier for a user to use their own pre-indexed genome. The advantage is that the pipeline is more self-contained; indexing gets updated with aligner version; and the sample data can be used to run out of the box if given a reference genome.
